name: 林秀真
objective: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
schedule:
Week 1	Warm Up--Introduction 	
Week 2	*Brainstorming---Think fast	
Week 3	*Brainstorming---Think fast	
Week 4	Listening Comprehension	
Week 5	Listening Comprehension	
Week 6	Interpretation 	
Week 7	Interpretation	
Week 8	 Impromptu Speech	
Week 9	Mini-drama	
Week 10	Note-taking	
Week 11	Note-taking	
Week 12	Oral Reconstruction	
Week 13	Oral Reconstruction	
Week 14	Summarizing	
Week 15	Talk Show	
Week 16	Talk Show	
Week 17	Movie	
Week 18	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading System: 
 Attendance and Participation   30%
 Weekly tests                   50% 
 Final test                     20%
materials:
1. CNN Interactive English    2. Magazine Articles
3. Newspapers and TV news   4. TV Talk shows     5. Movies
